page.title: 17Gt.Harrowden Nr. Finedon
page.content: Gt.Harrowden is a very small silent village hardly more than a hamlet on the main road from Wellingborough to Kettering. Turning off from the main road are two quiet roads.One is The Slips and it turns off beside the golf course and leads to Finedon. Some of the houses are detached,some terraced and some are made of Northamptonshire sandstone. The gates leading to the golf club are very ornate with two angels standing on gateposts. There are two churches,All Saints a C.of E. building and a small Catholic Chapel in the grounds of the old hall.
